data.name: urban fight - level4
data.detailed_description:
The DLC contains a new level "neon city - Street". New enemies waiting for you to challenge!

Gravity body armor - super thick HP, super high attack, but very bulky.

Heavy artillery mecha - it can lock mechanical soldiers and launch powerful energy particle guns, which will be blown up directly after hitting.

Destroy robots - use 2 weapons, muskets and alloy knives at the same time. It can attack from a distance or close combat. The big move is to destroy the charge, lock the mechanical warrior and slash.

Machine gun mercenary - this enemy is very flexible and can use the enemy to advance and retreat
data.about_the_game:
The DLC contains a new level "neon city - Street". New enemies waiting for you to challenge!

Gravity body armor - super thick HP, super high attack, but very bulky.

Heavy artillery mecha - it can lock mechanical soldiers and launch powerful energy particle guns, which will be blown up directly after hitting.

Machine gun mercenary - this enemy is very flexible and can use the enemy to advance and retreat
data.short_description: The new level "neon city - Street" is more prosperous than "neon city - Corner", and there are many obstacles on the field, such as fire hydrants, garbage bags, flower stands, rooftops, neon lights, stores, small shops, etc
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel I5 2500
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950, AMD R9 280 or newer
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Joshua scs(10K2+XP+W7)
  • Additional Notes: Playing Caton suggests lowering the image quality
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window10
  • Processor: Intel I5 9400 or i7 8700
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics, of course, the higher the processor
